title: Should I sell my old mobile for a new one? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you 've no financial problems then don't sell your mobile cause you 'll never get it's correct value, especially if it is in pristine condition used mostly indoors. My Lenovo Vibe K5+ (3+16 Gb FHD Screen SD616 CPU) of 2016 is almost new with original battery still holding a day's charge but it doesn't have VoLte, support for Jio SIM. But with Vi™ Airtel SIM it works fine on 4G & H+. I plan to continue with it as it is my first smartphone with full aluminium metal body. Always best, to keep a backup mobile in case your main one fails or is lost. So don't sell it is my advice. Swami Aniruddha

It depend on the need… if you have enough money than you have option to not to sell. But other way if you don't have that much money you have to definitely sell the old one. The benefit of not selling old mobile is only that if that is used by you in some way or you need two mobile phone. Otherwise you can sell it.
